text: Ümit Birol (born 26 January 1963) is a retired Turkish football midfielder and later manager. He was capped once for Turkey, and was also a squad member at the 1987 Mediterranean Games. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Turkish footballers Category:Samsunspor footballers Category:Adanaspor footballers Category:Antalyaspor footballers Category:Adana Demirspor footballers Category:Altay S.K. footballers Category:Fenerbahçe S.K. footballers Category:Kocaelispor footballers Category:Dardanelspor footballers Category:Eskişehirspor footballers Category:Yıldırım Bosna S.K. footballers Category:Turkey international footballers Category:Turkish football managers Category:Altay S.K. managers Category:Alibeyköy S.K. managers Category:Competitors at the 1987 Mediterranean Games Category:Mediterranean Games bronze medalists for Turkey
title: Ümit Birol
